description: Meron HS Hooded Jacket. Designed for high alpine use and other demanding conditions. 3-layer Gore-Tex® Pro material guarantees reliable weather protection and durability. The stormproof, helmet-compatible hood features a reinforced visor to ensure your field of vision remains unrestricted. The perfect choice for tours with extreme weather conditions and demanding routes.
name: Mammut Meron HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
